mean: a room where an artist or photographer works; a place where a movie, television show, or radio show is recorded

examples.text: She is a teacher at a dance studio.
He got a job at a major movie studio.
I'm being trained to work at a broadcast studio.
I was a part of a studio audience for a television show.
He is a studio executive at a major production company.
We had to redo the whole studio recording.
Our family portrait was taken in a photo studio.
